page.title: 03Games People Play.
page.content: When I am at home we play tennis, rounders and a game called{Three Bad {Eggs.}Three Bad Eggs is played with a group of people who stand in a circle. One person is in the middle of the circle and each person in the circle has to choose a particular car - like Sierra, Datsun Sunny , Cavalier etc. The person in the middle shouts out the name of one of the cars and he throws the ball up in the air. The ball must be caught by that person who has chosen that car name. If the ball is dropped on the ground then the person in the middle changes places with whoever failed to catch the ball.
